hidden_abilites: Regular attacks hit air units. (Air attack possible)
Raises Orc units' critical hit rate by 3%.
Upon first appearing, can freeze all the enemies in the screen for a certain time at the rate of 50%.
Movement speed increases and summons 2 ice prisons during regular attacks; ice prisons can attack air units.
description.skill2: Increase HP of orc unit in Guild War (3.6%, 7.2%, 10.8%, 14.4%, 18%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Ice Wizard ]
